name: Titans Of Old: Hekate
description:
Titans of Old : Hekate is a top-down singleplayer dungeon-crawler game.
 In this game we play as Hekate, a Goddess/Titaness and experience her adventure through the Ancient Greek Underworld, fighting enemies and surviving the path to stop the grand evils that lay below from waking up and wrecking havoc.
 

CONTROLS:
W/A/S/D - Movement
LMB - Attack
E - Interact
ESC - In-Game Menu

PLEASE TEST OUR DEMO AND GIVE US FEEDBACK.
This is just a demo, just for testing purposes. There will be no Art included in this demo, just the mechanics and UI.

Feedback: Please Fill this Form
